name: Dull Knife
desc: Only slightly better than no weapon at all

name: Rusted Axe
desc: This axe has seen better days. Perhaps you should axe for a new one.

name: Battered Shield
desc: The royal mathematicians have conclusive proven that having something between you and a monster statistically increases your chances of not dying.

name: Holy Mace
desc: This blessed mace shields its user, providing added defense.

name: Rusted Greatsword
desc: The battles that this once great weapon took part in have been lost to history. It's still intimidating, though.

name: Jeweled Staff
desc: Basically a stick with a pretty rock in it. Some [citation needed] think it makes your magic better.

name: Rusted Warhammer
desc: While certainly not as fast or elegant as a sword, a warhammer in the hands of a skilled warrior can be a fearsome sight.
